poem:
**Black Hole**

In the bright chapel of the screen  
a boy knelt to a name: skyhigh.303.  
The sacrament was pressed, blue-white,  
and death came quicker than the reply.

Mothers pray to companies;  
police send paper into silence.  
The servers keep their fast:  
no blood, no words—only user information.
